tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Teena has been our rainbow after our difficult experience with another doctor for our previous pregnancy that led to an medical termination. 

From the first visit, Dr. Teena was super positive and kept it very real. She gives you information that you need and nothing more. She is patient to answer all your questions and also a good counsellor for when you have apprehensions and worries. One big help was her availability over messages for times when I had some challenges during pregnancy and also post delivery. 

Personally the fact that my age (37) didnt bother her and she never mentioned it or questioned me about why I/we waited so long before getting pregnant etc was very comforting. She also instilled confidence in me, by not scaring me with the usual 'Oh this is a G3 pregnancy, there could be complications.. etc etc..'  

My delivery was also normal, she didnt push for a Ceserean delivery, allowed me to go through 14 horus of labour and yet when I almost gave up, she stood by me and encouraged me to go through with the process and thanks to her, I delivered a normal healthy baby girl, who is amlost 2 months old today. 

We will be eternally grateful to Dr. Teena for her support and guidance through my pregnancy, delivery and post delivery journey. God bless you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,
review:
******** *** **** ************* ** ************************************************************************************
We visited Teena Ma'am for our first born, we visited ma'am based on recommendation, and it turned out to be the best recommendation.

What we liked about ma'am************************************************
1. She is very polite, calm, and always smiling
2. She listened to all our doubts, anwered all our questions, even
the silly ones with same smiling face, as always
3. Throughout the pregnancy period, there was not a single
instance when we felt that ma'am is in hurry to see another
patient, and hence giving us less time, it never happened. It
was always us who said, we are done with questions :)
4. Very supportive, very understanding, ma'am ensured we feel
like home when talking to her
5. She prescribes very less and only needed medicines
6. Her focus/priority is normal delivery, and not cesarean.
Although in our case, my wife couldn't have a normal delivery,
but that has nothing to do with the doctor.
7. Ma'am gave good enough time to my wife during the delivery
8. She did a regular visit to see how my wife was progressing
after the delivery.

NOTE: Throughout the pregnancy, we just followed what mam said, without a doubt.

In my and my wife's understanding, ***** ***** ** ******** *** ** *** **** **** ********* ** ****** *** ** ****** ** ******* *** * **** ***** **** she is the one who should be consulted without a doubt.

Thanks a lot Teena Ma'am

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had heard about Dr. Teena's expert knack of dealing with patients and personally witnessed it during our journey of becoming parents.

I might sound bit emotional but trust me when my wife had heavy bleeding at 14th week of her pregnancy; we were taken a back. It was subchorionic hematoma of considerable size(>50%). Dr. Teena handled the situation very sensitively and accurate to the point where her expert diagnosis of the condition helped us sail till very end of this journey. The journey after 14th weeks was tough due to multiple other complications but Dr. Teena oversaw every bit of it closely and very carefully. Itâ€™s easier to get depressed with this kind of situation at hand but with Dr. Teena you are in for a treat. The way she handled the situation with her expert medical advice and guided us, we never felt stressed because Dr. Teena brings in a sound medical advice with a composed persona. Iâ€™ve never met a doctor who is not only the expert at her field but goes all-in for a patientâ€™s care. At times, we called her at 3 AM in the morning and she wouldnâ€™t think twice before picking up the call and guided us.

Dr. Teena has enormous attention to detail, medical accuracy and excellent interpersonal communication. As a patient what more one would expect? Iâ€™ve always had a peculiar complaint off doctors in India that they donâ€™t spend enough time with patients; Dr. Teena proved me utterly wrong. She is not only a compassionate doctor but an expert in her field. She knows what she is doing and does it with ease. I was amazed to see her knowledge and philosophy of practising evidence based medicine which was not only effective but was boon in case of my wifeâ€™s complicated pregnancy since we could not have afforded to go wrong at any stage. Dr. Teena explains you the possible diagnoses in detail and doesnâ€™t rush into a decision without your comfort; she is simply amazing at dealing with patients in the most humane way.

It wouldnâ€™t be an overstatement that doctors are God for patients; Dr. Teena is indeed one for us. If it was not for her then we couldnâ€™t have made to where we are today.  Thanks to her that we are blessed with beautiful twins. Thanks Dr. Teena for everything you have done and gave us such beautiful and everlasting joy and memories to cherish for our lives!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Please don't visit Teena Thomas ** *** *** ******** *** ****** ********. I had a very bad experience. My wife had a normal delivery for the first baby and we were consulting with Dr.Garima Jain and we did consult the same doctor for second pregnancy as well. Unfortunately the doctor had to go for vacation during our due date so we had to consult Teena Thomas for the delivery.  During first meet itself she said we will deliver baby tomorrow morning , ** **** ******** *** *** ******* ****** **** **** *** **** **** Then we told her my wife's first delivery was normal and we don't have an issue with second baby in scan until the due date so we want to try normal delivery. She was least interested *** ******** ** ****** * ******* ** ****** **** Then she asked us to get admitted. During the delivery time also, she made sure my wife is not moving from the bed, connecting all the nst machines etc.though baby's heart beat is fine, not sure why for 8hrs they had to connect nst. *** ****** ******** ** ******* ******* ****** **** ****** ****** ****** ********* **** **** **** *** *********** Finally we had to go for c section as doctor wished. ***** ** ******** **** *** ****** *** *** ***** * ******* ******* ** **** *** *** *** ** ***** ** ***** **** **** *** ** *** ****** **** ** **** *** ****** ******** ** ******* *** ***** **** ** **** *** ***** **** ** ****** ********* Very pathetic experience. ** *** ***** **** **** ***** * ***** **** ***** **** ***** ** ***. I'm seeing all the post delivery pain my wife is going through, *** *** ** **** ****** ***** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Teena Thomas was our gynaecologist and she is truly a gem and boon for us. My wife was completely stressed out as she had few complications even before pregnancy. Teena mam gave us all the hopes and was very supportive. She took special care and did not prescribe unnecessary medications. She ensured that my wife was naturally conceived. Throughout the pregnancy she was very friendly and reachable all the time even on phone. By the last trimester we got to know that AFI is decreasing and hitting lower limit. Even then the doctor was very calm and composed which made us stay positive. She tried her level best for normal delivery but we had to go for C section as the baby was finding it difficult to breath. We are blessed with a baby boy and it's all because of the extra care and support that the doctor provided. It's not only the treatment that she provides, its actually the time, care, counseling she provides makes her the best out of others. Me and my family are very grateful to her. Of course, we strongly recommend Dr. Teena. 

The hospital nursing department is doing an exceptional job. The patience and attention they show is truly appreciable. Our baby was admitted in NICU for almost a week due to low birth weight. It was the toughest time for us. The care and kindness the NICU nurses showed actually boosted our hope and made us believe that our baby is in the right hands. They understand the stress each parents go through and answer any queries even if you keep bugging them. Me and my family will never forget their service and will always have that respect towards them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
Dr.Teena came across as a blessing for us and our new born when we had given up after visiting doctors/ hospitals that made us go through unnecessary tests and treated pregnant women like patients. She would not only avoid unnecessary tests/meds, but also calmed us down whenever we panicked. Within a couple of consultations, our stance shifted from going hometown for delivery, to delivering wherever she is available.

Dr. Teena came has not just an OBG for us, but also a guide, friend who we could approach anytime and everytime (even when she was on vacation), and to top that she herself followed up on questions asked over phone/ text. A good human being, a great mother makes her the best of her lot. She treats each pregnant women personally and ensures they  carry a smaile at all times and talks them through the issues- not all OBG would care this much. Also, she has gone beyond just OBG duties to help us in emergency situation for our newborn.

If you're consulting her, be ensured you're in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Our experience with Dr. Teena Thomas was outstanding. Her professional approach and commitment to our well-being were evident from the start. Dr. Teena avoided unnecessary medications and tests, ensuring a focused and efficient journey.

She maintained clear communication, addressing our concerns with empathy and reassurance. Her expertise led to a successful, normal delivery, and her commitment to avoiding unnecessary panic made the entire process stress-free.

We highly recommend her for exceptional and precise care throughout the pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Teena Thomas, very good OBG we have ever seen. We will always recommend her for every couple.  
On visiting few doctors/hospitals, we met her at RXDX Bangalore. She has asked us to get done some basic which was resulted positive. Looking at our age factor, she has advised us for fertility treatments. She played a good mentor role at every stage. As per her suggestion we have attempted two fertility treatments but some time you get success in harder way. Outcome was not in our favor. 
Family members were insisted to get further treatment at Mumbai. There we strongly disagreed, the doctor, who was mentoring us as family member, who was praying to god for us, how can we discontinue her treatment. We wanted get treatment under her till last hope.
Day came, GOD has decided to fulfill our wish. We received positive result for pregnancy test. We were at MUMBAI for attending family function. We were super excited and jumping with joy. We were eager to share this happy movement with Dr. Teena. I have alone travelled to Bangalore since my better half was asked to take rest for few weeks. I remember that day, when I conveyed the new to her (Dr. Teena), I have seen her happier and relaxed for us. There were no second thought of delivering a baby elsewhere. We wanted to bring our bundle of joy under her treatment/supervision only. 
Her support was excellent. She had explained us about each step of treatment / medicines. For our every question, she had always given explanations. Many occasions, we have received answer for the question asked on whatapps chat also. For us she was available to us anytime / every time.
Finally, there was end to tensions and worries. Few days back we are blessed with baby boy. Really it is a beginning of a wonderful journey of parenting. 
We are very much thankful to Dr. Teena Thomas for all her help. We really want to appreciate her support, guidance at every step, personalized attention.

She's always available on calls and messages to answers our queries which is a plus during these 9 months .Doesn't ask for any unwanted scans to be done. I was so worried about my d day but having she as my doc all went so smooth. I admire her a lot for the way she handled my case , and would recommend her to my other friends too. Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
I have been consulting Teena Thomas madam after I conceived. She guided me and my husband throughout the delivery (Delivered baby girl on August1st). I didn't face any kind of difficulties during the 9 months. She was always there to help through whatsapp for any emergencies.

Teena madam is such a good person who talks calmly and is ready to answer any kind of queries. She is more like a friend who treats her patients with cheerfulness ( This is what is needed in a Doctors so that patient doesn't panic).

She is such an eminent and highly experienced professional that I have ever come across.

I highly recommend Teena madam for those who are insearch of a very good Gynaecologist and obstetrician in Bangalore.

Punctuality is a virtue not everyone has be it even a doctor . The doc was not 10-20 minutes late but an hour late. She was so casual in talking and trying to diagnose .*** *** ********** ********* ** ************* ** ******* *** *** *** *** **** ** ** ***She checked me with no sincerity or friendliness .
It's just not worth the money and that's it !
Avoid visiting her if one wants to saved from unnecessary wastage of time and money and efforts because the person we are paying just does not care!!

Hats off to their expertise and experience. With all these, I highly recommend Dr Teena thomas for any new expecting parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Teen Thomas - you can trust your life with her !With me being a paitient of cysts, Obesity & depression for years, was worried & anxious about everything related to pregnancy.Dr Teena was a saviour & explained me all different ways & means available to help.She made me calm down with her systematic & soothing approach.The preconception, 9 months of pregnancy & the C - Section was all smooth in her guidence & excellant skills.I cant thank her enough for all the support she extended to me & for the safe delivery of my beautiful daughter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Highly recommend Teena mam.
2 miscarriage prior to successful delivery.
All the three times we did consultation with mam. I have lupus for the past 12 years. So pregnancy wasn't a cake walk. Mam had all the patience to deal with any situation, so understanding and her expertise is beyond our imagination. Everyone suggested when we went for third time pregnancy planning to consult a different gynaecologist,but we were sure that, if we deliver, it would be teena mam who would!. 
Her availability for your emergencies wil make you feel, she is near to God. 
Had a beautiful delivery experience and we are happy with our little girl. 
She has all the experience in dealing high risk pregnancies. Thoroughly recommend her for a blissful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: All 5 stars are for Dr. Teena Thomas, She is excellent throughout the journey of 9 months. She doesnâ€™t suggest any medicines or scans unnecessarily, for any treatment or any medication she will clearly explain why those are required. She listens all the concerns very patiently and answers every question you ask without any frustration. Apart from treatment we liked her moral support. Especially when my wife get tensed during some circumstances her support and guidance is priceless. My family especially my mother is more happy with Teenaâ€™s treatment and guidance. I refer Teena Thomas without any second thought.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,Normal Delivery,
review: I've been consulting Dr. Teena from very beginning around 5 weeks of my pregnancy. Very friendly and patient to listen all of my problems. I've suffered with subchorionic hematoma at 6 weeks. She was very supportive and was under medication for a whole month. No un-necessary scans and medication. I've undergone less scans(with complication) than my friends who has no complication. She responds to the calls any time. Finally delivered a healthy baby boy at 37 weeks through normal Delivery. I am Really happy that I chose Dr. Teena.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr. Teena is one of those doctors who has a great attitude and an amazing gift to diagnose the underlying illnesses of her patients accurately. She takes her patients seriously and explains everything in detail. She took very good care of me during and after the pregnancy. She was very receptive to my concerns and doesn't hurry through the consulation. One really good thing about her is she doesn't prescribe medicines unnecessarily. She made the entire process of delivering a baby very easy and was extremely supportive throughout and after delivery. She makes sure that the person accompanying you is also thoroughly updated about everything that needs to be addressed during each visit.Altogether we had a wonderful experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Teena was my gynacologist when I was pregnant with my first baby. Delivered a healthy baby boy. It was a very smooth journey with her. What i liked most is that she gives time to hear our problems, her diagnosis are spot on and she does not unnecessarily prescribe medicines. It's not just her treatment but also counselling during postpartum stress that is amazing. I was understand lot of stress post pregnancy ( hormonal changes) but her counselling just healed me.  I thank her from the bottom of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very friendly, she has a cool attitude and explains everything in detail. I visited for pregnancy her advice is really very helpful, I was very depressed because of two miscarriages :( she carries positive vibes with her, she explained everything very clearly and detail, and found were the problem  is. She is available in phone and mags, reply to them no matter at what time.After her advice I got pregnant  and it was successful. Now I have my baby girl by my side it's all because of her.Thank you soon much mam :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,

She took care of me very well throughout my pregnancy and I was able to give birth to a baby with normal delivery. I am completely satisfied with her treatment and admire her personally and would like to recommend her for pre and post delivery care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review: Dr. Teena has been extremely supportive and helpful through out my pregnancy. I had two bad pregnancies before. It was an emotionally and physically challenging time for me and my family. Her support and encouragement helped us get through. I finally became mother of baby girl and I give all credit to her for guiding and helping me throughout my pregnancy.She was always available for consultation even when she was not on duty. She also reached out to me when I was out of town to make sure I was doing okay. She has been more than a doctor. I would definitely recommend her to the expectant mothers wanting the best for their babies and themselves.

tags: None

review: I would like to thank Dr. Teena *** *** ******* ********** She heard to my problems patiently. The best thing I liked in her was that, she listens to the patient carefully before jumping on to conclusions unlike many orther doctors I had visited earlier for the same issue. She gave me confidence when I was not feeling well or was tensed because of the health issues. She gave me a proper direction to a step by step solution or treatment process right on the first day. She has explained to me the benifits & use of each & every medicine prescribed. I never found her getting irritated of my stupid questions. As my case was a bit rare, she took it upon herself to further research before giving a final decision. In simple words I was never misguided by her. ****** ********** * a successful surgery has made me almost fit today. Really thankful to the doctor for her great work. Cheers !! May god bless you.

tags: None
review: Dr. Teena Thomas is very patient in listening to your queries and give you all kind of advices a patient needs in her pregnancy. The most important thing I love about her is her availability. You can call her any time of the day for emergency. If she is busy in an operation theatre, she will call you back after the procedure. Once I got urinary infection pain at early morning 2 am and I waited until 6 am to call her. She said you could have called me before. She takes very much care in suggesting medicines and that even saved my pregnancy. My first pregnancy was a miscarriage and she helped me a lot in that one. Many people suggested me not going there for the second one. But I believed in her and here I am blessed with a healthy baby girl. Thank you so much Teena Mam and I will always suggest you.

review: I am so happy to write about Teena maâ€™am as my pregnancy and delivery journey went smooth with the help of her. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have had started consulting her about our MCDA twin pregnancy at early stage itself.
She is a no-nonsense professional. Explained us clearly all the risks involved in this high-risk pregnancy and supported and guided us to a successful delivery of full-term twins. She constantly monitored the growth of babies and health of mother and adjusted dosage of medicines and supplements which, I believe, helped the babies attain good weight (2.34 and 2.48 kgs). Babies and mother were discharged on the third day itself after a C-section delivery.

Some of my doctor colleagues scared me like I can't have normal delivery 
I can't complete full term pregnancy 
My baby weight won't cross 2.5kg etc
But instead of listening them 
I trusted Dr Teena mam

I had done my IUI treatment with her and it fell on the day of Easter Sunday. She still came to the hospital and did the procedure. I was later pregnant with twins. With twins I had a number of complications and she always kept calm which helped me not to panic.She responds on whatapp as well and never once did she get impatient. She always has a smile and that gives you more confidence.It was a wonderful experience with her and would definitely recommend her to my friends.

review: Visiting Dr. Teena was the best step we took. She is so calm and reassuring. In these times when doctors are prescribing tests and investigations indiscriminately, Doctor Teena stands out. She never suggested any unnecessary tests or medicines. She is always reachable on phone or whatsapp. She is truly an asset to Apollo Cradle. Will surely recommend Dr.Teena without a doubt.

One little thing which I did not appreciate about her is that she tends to scare us about the things that can go wrong. It sometimes becomes demoralising. ***** **** **** *** ** * **** **** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Many miscarriages, almost all doctors started playing ovf advises and kind of getting too much out of hands. A doctor said "you are young still, let it go.. we will save the next".

Tina on our first visit said, this is a very simple trouble, just use a .75 ps tablet and an injection during pregnancy for blood thinning. Bingo, smooth delivery.

This is experience talking expertise with at most passion to your profession.
